website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable, inexpensive, and durable, these baseball cleats are an all-around great entry model that will fit most kids.
pros: Padded heel and collar for extra overall comfort
cons: Not the best option for children with wide feet

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: They came dirty, obviously worn before. Also they are a little to tight, he normally wears an 11 but would probably need a 12 in these.
customer_reviews.author: Lauraizzle

customer_reviews.title: Not good for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: I like the style of this cleat and it seems to be well made. It did seem pretty narrow and hard to get on. We had to loosen up most of the lace to get it to slide on for two different kids. Overall would recommend especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Palmer

customer_reviews.title: My son who is very picky with shoes loved them
customer_reviews.text: They look great, colors, materials, my son put them on for a baseball training session and said were very comfortable, he is used them in 2 training days now. He wears a 13 now, I order a 1 as the baseball socks are thicker than regular socks and he says the 1 fit him OK, not too loose not too tight.
customer_reviews.author: elena del toro

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cleats
customer_reviews.text: I bought the black and white version for my 5 year old who will be starting T-ball soon. These are great! They fit him well (bought his usual shoe size) and look fantastic. He loved them so much he insisted on wearing them to school the next day, lol. I also love that the laces are long enough to double knot them, since he doesn't know how to tie yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jen C.

customer_reviews.title: Great value deal
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the price. We have a lot of experience with cleats. These fit true to size, feel comfortable, light weight, and look really nice. Better quality than a lot of cleats at half the price of most. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Great deal! Child size 6 is about the equivalent of a women's 7.5, so a tad smaller than I expected thinking it would be like an 8. Overall, great look, good brand, and cheaper than in store at the time of purchase. Daughter wore for an entire weekend of softball without breaking them in prior & didn't complain about them making her feet sore.
customer_reviews.author: C.T.

customer_reviews.title: Very rare toddler size
customer_reviews.text: After searching for hours at local sporting goods stores in my area, I finally found these cleats for my small 4 year old t-ball player. They are very stiff straight out of the box but after using glove oil on them and working them by hand they softened up enough to be comfy before his first game.
customer_reviews.author: Boymom2

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy cleat
customer_reviews.text: It took me 3 tries to find the right size. I think they run a little small. I know they are supposed to fit tight so they don’t flop off when they run but I had to loosen the laces a lot just to get his foot in. There wasn’t much lace left to tie. They look great, really stunning. You can tell that they’re well made and sturdy. I will buy these again in the next size for next year.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Anico

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good shoe for the money
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes overall. My daughter says they were comfortable from the first time she put them on and they didn’t need to be broken in. The only down side we have found is that by the end of the second tournament she had worn a hole in part of the shoe but since it’s near the top of the shoe where shoelaces sit
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Good for first time basball players
customer_reviews.text: A good pair of cleats for a 6 year old, first time basball player. They are fairly easy to get on but run a little small and narrow compared to several other brands of athletic shoes. I bought a size 13 for a kid who normally fits in a 12 and there was no room to spare. 6yo says they are comfortable and easy to run in.
customer_reviews.author: Mom/student nurse/shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, reliable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit nice and snug on child to allow for running without issue. The white color has not been a problem, have been able to easily wipe the dirt away after baseball practices/games. Great price for a good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These cleats, can’t be beat!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this cleat! It resembles a tennis shoe...it doesn’t look like the usual baseball cleats. For my son this shoe runs a lil snug so I had to do the half size.
customer_reviews.author: LAALAA419

customer_reviews.title: Good UA quality shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These were great for my son's fall baseball season, especially for the price! Be aware, they run a tad small and narrow, especially if your child is wearing baseball socks. I recommend buying a bit bigger!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Solid Shoe, Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Solid shoe with very reasonable price. With a limited season in 2020, we wanted something reasonable for my 8 year old son. He says they are comfortable and he loves the red color that he picked. I can't comment on durability yet.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: great shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter. Did not want to spend a lot of money on new shoes as I did not know how much use she was going to get with her not playing as much with Covid. These were perfect for the price. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: Marci Mercado

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love them
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were bought for my great grandkids T-ball Games, and the kids love them so much they try to wear them all the time, they’re 4 years old twin boys
customer_reviews.author: Degolfer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: These turf cleats are perfect for my 11 year old. He plays select baseball and usually practices on turf but also sometimes plays on turf. Good quality. I highly recommend! Fit is as expected
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: First timer baseball shoe
customer_reviews.text: Seems durable lasted the season with no problems. Easy to wipe clean. Child did complain of comfort and laces were a bit short. Overall served its purpose. Good value for first shoe and trying out new sport.
customer_reviews.author: andtiff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: This was my sons first year playing baseball and we originally purchased another pair of cleats. They were very uncomfortable and too tight in the toe. Then we found these and they were very comfortable for him and fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slides on easily
customer_reviews.text: This is my son's 3rd pair of cleats and probably my favorite. We've tried out Under Armour cleats as well as Nike but these were overall better quality. The cushion on top of the shoe is great. For protecting his little feet from the ball. They slide on and off pretty easily for a kids shoe. I dislike that the shoe laces come untied easily (due to fabric type) and they seem a little short.
customer_reviews.author: Bryana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these! He is 4 and wears a size 12 shoe so I got him a 13 to last a little longer. They are great quality and he says they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha M

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 boys in baseball and have bought many cleats. I thought this was too good to be true because the price was so reasonable and they looked nice. We bought a pair for my 10 year old and they are great! Came as shown and look and feel great. They have held up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Mommylife

customer_reviews.title: Great cleats
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of cleats. They are nice because they don’t look like a traditional baseball cleat but more like a sneaker. They fit as expected. Great Under Armour quality
customer_reviews.author: Robin D.

customer_reviews.title: Fits fine
customer_reviews.text: Bought these last minute for my daughter for softball. She likes them a lot and they fit perfectly. I bought the right size and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Anya Rochester

customer_reviews.title: Great youth cleats
customer_reviews.text: More comfortable than the typical “plastic” type uppers common on most youth baseball cleats. The “sneaker”type upper and heavily padded collar make these cleats very wearable. They are not as easy to get clean after a few games so I wouldn’t recommend white but it’s a small sacrifice for the additional comfort.As for durability, who knows, unless they’re getting handed down kids usually outgrow them before they are worn out.
customer_reviews.author: CRAIG L HAVEN

customer_reviews.title: great buy - great price
customer_reviews.text: 6 year old boy loved them; am cheap, so i bought a size too big, but he was able to play in them and hopefully can do so next year
customer_reviews.author: Doug Tomich

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and fit to size
customer_reviews.text: These are very sturdy shoes. We bought them for our child to play t-ball and they fit just to size without any slipping out. They're also not too tight on their feet.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Ross

customer_reviews.title: We love these! Great for my 5 year olds t-ball!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old wears the size 13! We ordered them a little big since he will wear a thick sock.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Eakes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Little League
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these for his basebll games. Matches his uniform :) He says they are comfortable- no complaints after games.
customer_reviews.author: Jen PJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and True to Size
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for our little one, fit true to size and kept him locked to the field! Price was great and arrived quickly :-)
customer_reviews.author: Joi S.

customer_reviews.title: They’re solid cleats
customer_reviews.text: Got them at a great price for my son and he likes them/uses them just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleats
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these cleats! They're softer and more comfortable than most cleats in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Guirate

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic and very durable and surprisingly not expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great Beginner Cleat
customer_reviews.text: Great cleat for a baseball beginner! Durable, comfy and they have fun colors!
customer_reviews.author: SarahMc

customer_reviews.title: awesome shows and kiddo loves them
customer_reviews.text: she loves her shoes for softball this year. rest of her team ordered some to match :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, fits as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year old, he usually wears size 12 and he has chunky toes lol. So I bought him a size 13 and fits him perfectly. Still some wiggly room. Love the material, he loves them and says they are comfortable. I take it coming from my 4 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer Reinisch

customer_reviews.title: Hope they're good
customer_reviews.text: Son hasn't used yet but well.see if they're good for him
customer_reviews.author: Christopher klecka

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for youth baseball
customer_reviews.text: I got size 3 for my 7 yr old (49” height) just starting baseball. He loves it. Comfy, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria M K

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes but arrived a half size up
customer_reviews.text: We received the shoes today and they look great. My daughter had a great first game with them and is very pleased. Very comfortable and seems good quality. However, I had ordered size 4 and they arrived in Size 4.5. The shoes are quite narrow, it is therefore not an issue, my daughter will use them longer!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Always great quality
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair of same style for 10 yr old softball player. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: PFM

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: These run a bit narrow, sending back for a 1/2 size up
customer_reviews.author: Mommaof3boys

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My son used these all season and they were very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Garton

customer_reviews.title: No issues.
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feel great! My 9 year old loves them.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Under Armour always has quality
customer_reviews.text: My five year old loves them! She says they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Carraway

customer_reviews.title: Runs narrow
customer_reviews.text: Too narrow for my son’s foot. Need to return and try a different style. Too bad because they look like a quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Q-Dig

customer_reviews.title: Great show
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves his new cleats and they look great with their dark gray uniforms
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: My boy loves them
customer_reviews.text: My boy said these shoes are comfortable and he didn’t want to take them off.
customer_reviews.author: ChaGah99

customer_reviews.title: They look great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to get off and on for my 6yo. Look great.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: I bought these size 8 big kid for my 9 year old usually a size 6. I took pic next to a soda for size comparison. The shoe is smaller than the soda. We got a good laight but def returning my kids foot is way to big for these.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Grobosky

customer_reviews.title: Good cleats
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe worked perfect looked sharp and my son likes them
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: We love Under Armour
customer_reviews.text: She loved her new baseball shoes!! Under armour rocks as usual!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Venable

customer_reviews.title: Great cleats!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous that these may be a little small since sometimes this brand runs smaller, but they fit perfectly and my son loves them! He wears a 1 so I ordered a 1.5 and I think he’ll even be able to wear them next season! Definitely a good buy for two seasons of use!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: My son loves em
customer_reviews.text: My son's favorite pair of cleats. and a great price! No more nikes
customer_reviews.author: ANG

customer_reviews.title: Great cleats!
customer_reviews.text: Great softball cleats and good price! Looks cute on daughter!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy P

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Size
customer_reviews.text: I purchased an 8 "big kid" the actual size was an 8K or toddler size. Otherwise they were a great looking pear of cleats! Just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: christina ambriz

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These are a good shoe for boys and the price was very fair.
customer_reviews.author: chad hoose

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My son loved them he said they were very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: L.M.

customer_reviews.title: Low stock in sizes
customer_reviews.text: Show worked great for my 3year old toddler. Was told they run a little small and that’s correct. Suggest ordering up one size. But other than that, it was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Berdell Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love these cleats!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to spend a fortune again on more cleats, my son outgrows them fast. These cleats are great. The look expensive and are great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: The shoes match her uniform and she looks great wearing them!
customer_reviews.text: My Granddaughter plays softball, they fit her perfect and she loves them. Nice well made shoes , Thanks so much
customer_reviews.author: Drema Sampson

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is off
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is complicated I ordered 10 big kid received 10 toddler my daughter is 10 years 4th grade waste of my time
customer_reviews.author: BOB HOLGUIN

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of Cleats
customer_reviews.text: Great clear for my Seven year old. Love the look. And it is so much easier to put in than his on pair of Addidas
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Cole

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers. No drawbacks!
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. My five year old loves them! And he has fat lil feet 😆
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Happy

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: My niece love her new softball shoes, they are very comfortable. I'll be ordering her another pair next year.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great cleats !
customer_reviews.text: 8 year old son loved these. They are very easy to get on and off, unlike the high tops. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a powerhouse brand!
customer_reviews.text: My son needed new cleats, actually his first cleats. I didn't want to spend a lot, but these UA cleats were only $30!
customer_reviews.author: Jason VanBuskirk

customer_reviews.title: Not for a wide foot
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wears a 13 and we had to go up a size due to her having a wider foot plus having socks on too. Size 1 for great! Nice pair of cleats!
customer_reviews.author: Shana Slash

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking cleats and arrived as if I had purchased directly from the store.
customer_reviews.author: Erik M.

customer_reviews.title: Right size
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used them yet but I'm glad they fit just right
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: "Mom my cleats need pink!"
customer_reviews.text: Tight on my daughter but she's also in between sizes! Very sturdy and will last!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Lingenfelser

customer_reviews.title: Great cleats
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size my son wears a 13 so in cleats you always go up a size. He really likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Krystina

customer_reviews.title: Size is misleading
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 8 for my 12 year old nephew because it said big kid size 8. I recieved them today and my 4 year old nephew could wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Worley

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them. Comfortable, never complains about her feet hurting as with others.
customer_reviews.author: yami garcia

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: Maybe a little on the narrow side but my son has a thick foot. He wore them around the house to break them in some and loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son for summer baseball. held up all summer. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. My son loves them. Super comfy he states
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Quality is very good. They fit my daughter well too.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Run small but great quality
customer_reviews.text: They run small my almost 4 year old is a good a sport even though they are tight on her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my sons first t ball experience. Love the color of the shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, and feels good
customer_reviews.text: This pair of shoes came in before the estimated date and was perfect fit for my son (11) yrs old.
customer_reviews.author: G. Orillo

customer_reviews.title: Seemed to run at least 1 size too small
customer_reviews.text: I would go at least 1 size bigger My daughter wears a size 2 in same brand, had to go to a size 3 in the cleats
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Nice overall cleat
customer_reviews.text: My son says they untie too easily otherwise he likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie L Nixon

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Kid loves them. Comfortable and got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Right fit
customer_reviews.text: They fit well and look great. 4 year old loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality baseball shoes
customer_reviews.text: Product comes just as is in picture, very nice and aesthetic
customer_reviews.author: Jesse kauhane

customer_reviews.title: It's too small
customer_reviews.text: This product was sent back with the other same wrong shoe size!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Beck

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I liked the color and the quality. I bought it to make a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Guillén

product_meta.title: Under Armour Kids' Leadoff Low Rm Jr. Baseball Shoe
product_meta.description: Synthetic upper is lightweight & durable with perforations in the toe box for added breathability. Durable overlay on toe cap for added protection. Padded collar & heel construction for ultimate step-in comfort. Full-length EVA midsole for added comfort, cushioning that evenly distributes cleat pressure under the foot. Rubber molded cleats provide optimal traction & durability on all field surfaces.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
Synthetic upper is lightweight & durable with perforations in the toe box for added breathability
Durable overlay on toe cap for added protection
Padded collar & heel construction for ultimate step-in comfort
Full-length EVA midsole for added comfort, cushioning that evenly distributes cleat pressure under the foot
Rubber molded cleats provide optimal traction & durability on all field surfaces
